creator: aheritier@sopragroup.com
text:
Hi guys.
I retreived a jar of ORO in the struts dist.
In this Jar there isn't the release in the Manifest file.
The Jar is a 2.0.6 according to the struts dev team.

Thanks

creator: dfs@apache.org
text:
This is not an appropriate bug report.  If the reporter had bothered to
do a CVS checkout of the latest source or downloaded the latest development
release, he would find when you build the jar, you get a manifest with
versioning information.  Furthermore, enhancements should be discussed on
oro-dev first instead of submitting hit and run bugzilla enhancement requests
that generate no discussion.

creator: dfs@apache.org
text: Report was invalid, therefore it is being closed.
